column4: hey guys I have just installed a program on ubuntu and I added the shortcut to the menu bar, but for some reason its nto showing up right, the icon is showing as  a dark box , if you go to properties tho the correct icon is there... any ideas?
hmmm actually the icon isnt there anymore.. I re-started and now its gone... any ideas how you set an icon properly?
i had that problem too, after restarting the icon was shown
hmmm re-starting for me does the oppisit
e
then what about changing the icon and then set it back to the original?
- do you have to re-start every time you change the icon?
no
alright thanks
I will try that now

i think it can handle pbg and jpeg only, but maybe im wrong
png*

open the file with gimp and then save it in adifferent fromat
